name: Reverse Bull Riding

As [TargetName] lies on [TargetHisOrHer] back the sky suddenly darkens as the impressive physique of [AttackerName] hangs above [TargetHimOrHer], her powerful pussy hungry and wet. |n|In a flash [AttackerName] descends upon the prone hero and presses her pussy to the face of [TargetName], who is immediately overcome with the slightly sweaty scent of her athletic pussy.
